title: IEdge.Display
description: Highlights this edge with the specified color.

parameters.name: HighlightState
parameters.description: True if the edge is highlighted, false if not

remarks: To show the same edge with a different color, hide it and then set a different color. SOLIDWORKS shows the edge in the specified color until you hide it. Rotation, zoom, other repaint actions do not cause the edge to disappear.

examples.title: Add Highlighting to or Remove Highlighting From Edges (VBA)
